long_description: The lightweight, portable, and easy-to-use Pocket Pal knife sharpener from Smith's features carbide heads and fine ceramic stones to quickly set and finish the edge on your blade. Excellent for use on all types of straight-edged knives. Preset, carbide cutting blades quickly set edges and are excellent for very dull or damaged edges. Tapered diamond rod sharpens serrated edges.
short_description: The lightweight, portable, and easy-to-use Pocket Pal knife sharpener from Smith's features carbide heads and fine ceramic stones to quickly set and finish the edge on your blade.
